00036   TableInfo::TableInfo(const String &table_name) {
00037     memset(&m_table, 0, sizeof(TableIdentifier));
00038     m_table.name = new char [strlen(table_name.c_str()) + 1];
00039     strcpy((char *)m_table.name, table_name.c_str());
00040   }
00041 
00042   void TableInfo::load(Hyperspace::SessionPtr &hyperspace_ptr) {
00043     String table_file = (String)"/hypertable/tables/" + m_table.name;
00044     DynamicBuffer valbuf(0);
00045     HandleCallbackPtr null_handle_callback;
00046     uint64_t handle;
00047 
00048     handle = hyperspace_ptr->open(table_file.c_str(), OPEN_FLAG_READ,
00049                                   null_handle_callback);
00050 
00051     hyperspace_ptr->attr_get(handle, "schema", valbuf);
00052 
00053     Schema *schema = Schema::new_instance((const char *)valbuf.base,
00054                                           valbuf.fill(), true);
00055     if (!schema->is_valid())
00056       HT_THROWF(Error::RANGESERVER_SCHEMA_PARSE_ERROR,
00057                 "Schema Parse Error: %s", schema->get_error_string());
00058     m_schema_ptr = schema;
00059 
00060     m_table.generation = schema->get_generation();
00061 
00062     valbuf.clear();
00063     hyperspace_ptr->attr_get(handle, "table_id", valbuf);
00064 
00065     m_table.id = atoi((const char *)valbuf.base);
00066 
00067     hyperspace_ptr->close(handle);
00068 
00069   }
